item.title: Spacemacs Email
item.description: mu4e fastmail setup Display HTML mails better Config file location ~/.config/isyncrc mu init --maildir=~/Maildir mu indexWorkflow bX to go into a search Keys Keys Main View j Jump to maildir folder s Enter a mu find search string (see below) C Compose a new email bx Run bookmark x ; Switch context U Update email and mu database q Quit mu4e Message View u - unmark x - execute marks
